select t.dept_id as deptId, t.parent_id as parentId, t.ancestors, t.dept_name as deptName, t.dept_abbreviation as deptAbbreviation, t.order_num as orderNum, t.leader_charge as leaderCharge, t.dept_code as deptCode, t.dept_identity_type as deptIdentityType from ( select dept_id,parent_id,ancestors,dept_name,dept_abbreviation,order_num,leader_charge, dept_code, (case when SUBSTR(dept_code,1,1) = 'A' then '1' when SUBSTR(dept_code,1,1) = 'B' then '1' when SUBSTR(dept_code,1,1) = 'C' then '3' else null end) as dept_identity_type from sys_dept where status = '0' and del_flag = '0' order by order_num ) t where t.dept_identity_type is not null and t.dept_name not in ('局领导','巡视员','总师')
